snippet: The future of the United States Grand Prix was thrown into further doubt when the 2016 Formula One calendar listed the race as “subject to agreement” with the promoter.
lead_paragraph: The future of the United States Grand Prix was thrown into further doubt when the 2016 Formula One calendar listed the race as “subject to agreement” with the promoter.

headline.main: Formula One Race in Texas Looks Less Likely
headline.print_headline: Formula One Race in Texas Looks Less Likely
